SELECT h.hid,h.harea,h.hcommunity,h.htshi,h.hting,h.htwei,h.hmode,h.hprice, h.hspace,h.hpaymethod,h.hlabel,h.htime,h.hpid,h.hadress,h.udescribe,h.htid, h.hstate,h.aid, m.htid,m.htype,m.htdirect,m.htbed,m.htcar,m.htweb,m.htv,m.htwashing, m.htheating,m.htait,m.htrfrt,m.htheater,m.hfloor,m.hfloors, a.aid,a.aphone,a.aname FROM house h inner JOIN house_mating m ON h.htid = m.htid inner JOIN account a ON h.aid=a.aid
and CONCAT(h.hadress,h.harea,h.hcommunity) LIKE '%${searchs}%'
and h.hadress like '%${hadress}%'
and CONCAT(h.harea,h.hcommunity) like '%${harea}%'
and h.hprice BETWEEN #{hprice1} AND #{hprice2}
and h.hmode = #{hmode}
and h.htshi = #{htshi}
and h.htshi not IN ('1室','2室','3室','4室','5室')
and m.htdirect = #{htdirect}
and hfloor+0 <= 10
and m.hfloor+0 > 10 AND hfloor <= 20
and m.hfloor+0 > 20
and m.htype like '%${htype}%'
ORDER BY h.hprice ASC
ORDER BY h.hprice DESC
ORDER BY h.hspace ASC
ORDER BY h.hspace DESC

SELECT h.hid,h.harea,h.hcommunity,h.htshi,h.hting,h.htwei,h.hmode,h.hprice, h.hspace,h.hpaymethod,h.hlabel,h.htime,h.hpid,h.hadress,h.udescribe,h.htid, h.hstate,h.aid, m.htid,m.htype,m.htdirect,m.htbed,m.htcar,m.htweb,m.htv,m.htwashing, m.htheating,m.htait,m.htrfrt,m.htheater,m.hfloor,m.hfloors, a.aid,a.aphone,a.aname FROM house h inner JOIN house_mating m ON h.htid = m.htid inner JOIN account a ON h.aid=a.aid where h.hid = #{hid}

SELECT h.hid,h.harea,h.hcommunity,h.htshi,h.hting,h.htwei,h.hmode,h.hprice, h.hpaymethod,h.hlabel,h.htime,h.hpid,h.hadress,h.udescribe,h.htid, h.hstate,h.aid, m.htid,m.htype,m.htdirect,m.htbed,m.htcar,m.htweb,m.htv,m.htwashing, m.htheating,m.htait,m.htrfrt,m.htheater,m.hfloor,m.hfloors, a.aid,a.aphone FROM house h INNER JOIN house_mating m ON h.htid=m.htid INNER JOIN account a ON a.aid=h.aid WHERE h.hid >= (SELECT FLOOR( MAX(hid) * RAND()) FROM house ) ORDER BY h.hid LIMIT 12

SELECT h.hid,h.harea,h.hcommunity,h.htshi,h.hting,h.htwei,h.hmode,h.hprice, h.hspace,h.hpaymethod,h.hlabel,h.htime,h.hpid,h.hadress,h.udescribe,h.htid, h.hstate,h.aid, m.htid,m.htype,m.htdirect,m.htbed,m.htcar,m.htweb,m.htv,m.htwashing, m.htheating,m.htait,m.htrfrt,m.htheater,m.hfloor,m.hfloors, a.aid,a.aphone,a.aname FROM house h inner JOIN house_mating m ON h.htid = m.htid inner JOIN account a ON h.aid=a.aid WHERE h.aid =(SELECT aid FROM house WHERE hid=#{hid}) AND h.hid !=#{hid} LIMIT 3
